cards.name: Batman
cards.bio: The Dark Knight himself, using his intellect and gadgets to protect Gotham.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Batman standing on a rooftop overlooking Gotham, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Joker
cards.bio: The chaotic criminal mastermind with a love for anarchy.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Joker with a devious smile, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Harvey Dent
cards.bio: Gotham's White Knight, fighting for justice before his tragic fall.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Harvey Dent flipping a coin, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Commissioner Gordon
cards.bio: The resilient police commissioner dedicated to cleaning up the streets of Gotham.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Commissioner Gordon signaling with the Bat-Signal, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Alfred Pennyworth
cards.bio: The loyal butler of Bruce Wayne, offering sage advice and support.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Alfred Pennyworth in the Batcave, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Lucius Fox
cards.bio: The business manager of Wayne Enterprises who supplies Batman with his tech.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Lucius Fox with Batman's gadgets, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Rachel Dawes
cards.bio: A dedicated assistant district attorney and Bruce Wayne's childhood friend.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Rachel Dawes in the courtroom, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Scarecrow
cards.bio: A psychopathic criminal with a fear-inducing gas.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Scarecrow with his fear gas mask, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Two-Face
cards.bio: Harvey Dent's vengeful alter ego, driven by chance and retribution.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Two-Face flipping his coin, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Salvatore Maroni
cards.bio: The head of the Maroni crime family and a prominent figure in Gotham's underworld.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Salvatore Maroni in his office, The Dark Knight movie style

cards.name: Bane
cards.bio: The main antagonist of The Dark Knight Rises, a formidable foe with a strategic mind and brute strength.
cards.stable_diffusion_prompt: Bane standing powerfully, The Dark Knight Rises movie style
